p: Hovering the mouse over the “Collections” button will reveal the three collections stored in this digital archive, one of which is the SMC. Of note, the SMC is termed “The Schools” Collection’ in the digital archive but the discrepancy is not meaningful ( Figure 3C). Details of the manuscripts, such as volume number, school, location, and transcription rate can be accessed here. The filter function on the left panel allows easy and specific access to the materials according to the volume and page number or the county of interest.
